root.name: Movie
root.description: Datatype for storing and playing movies in Apple's QuickTime format. Movies must be located in the sketch's data directory or an accessible place on the network to load without an error.

method.mdescription: Reads the current frame from the movie
Returns true when a new frame is available
Jumps to a specific location in the movie
Returns the total length of the movie
Sets a multiplier for how fast/slow a movie should play
Sets how often new frames are read from the movie

root.constructor: Movie(parent, filename) Movie(parent, filename, fps) Movie(parent, url) Movie(parent, url, fps)

cparameter.cdescription: URL: location of the file on the network
